verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֤ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year שְׁתַּ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> she-Ta-yim In the second לְדָרְיָ֣וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> le-da-re-Ya-vesh of Darius הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, the king בַּחֹ֙דֶשׁ֙ <S%H2320><s%> ba-Cho-desh month הַשִּׁשִּׁ֔י <S%H8345><s%> hash-shish-Shi, in the sixth בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom day אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad in the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh; of the month הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah came דְבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- came the word יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- by חַגַּ֣י <S%H2292><s%> chag-Gai Haggai הַנָּבִ֗יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi, the prophet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to זְרֻבָּבֶ֤ל <S%H2216><s%> ze-rub-ba-Vel unto Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שְׁאַלְתִּיאֵל֙ <S%H7597><s%> she-'al-ti-'El of Shealtiel פַּחַ֣ת <S%H6346><s%> pa-Chat governor יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to יְהוֹשֻׁ֧עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' and to Joshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְהוֹצָדָ֛ק <S%H3087><s%> ye-ho-tza-Dak of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֥ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol the high לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֛ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus speaketh יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying הָעָ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am This people הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh This אָֽמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> 'a-me-Ru, say לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not עֶת־ <S%H6256><s%> 'et- The time בֹּ֛א <S%H935><s%> bo is not come עֶת־ <S%H6256><s%> 'et- the time בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD'S לְהִבָּנֽוֹת׃ <S%H1129><s%> le-hib-ba-Not. should be built פ Peh

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- Then came the word יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- by חַגַּ֥י <S%H2292><s%> chag-Gai Haggai הַנָּבִ֖יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi the prophet לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

הַעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> ha-'Et [Is it] time לָכֶם֙ la-Chem אַתֶּ֔ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem, you לָשֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> la-She-vet for you O ye to dwell בְּבָתֵּיכֶ֣ם <S%H1004><s%> be-vat-tei-Chem houses סְפוּנִ֑ים <S%H5603><s%> se-fu-Nim; in your cieled וְהַבַּ֥יִת <S%H1004><s%> ve-hab-Ba-yit and this house הַזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this חָרֵֽב׃ <S%H2720><s%> cha-Rev. desolate

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Now therefore thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot; of hosts שִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> Si-mu appoint לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <S%H3824><s%> le-vav-Chem heart עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and דַּרְכֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1870><s%> dar-chei-Chem. your ways

זְרַעְתֶּ֨ם <S%H2232><s%> ze-ra'-Tem Ye have sown הַרְבֵּ֜ה <S%H7235><s%> har-Beh much וְהָבֵ֣א <S%H935><s%> ve-ha-Ve and bring מְעָ֗ט <S%H4592><s%> me-'At, in little אָכ֤וֹל <S%H398><s%> a-Chol ye eat וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> ve-'ein- no לְשָׂבְעָה֙ <S%H7654><s%> le-sa-ve-'Ah but ye have not enough שָׁת֣וֹ <S%H8354><s%> sha-To ye drink וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> ve-'ein- one לְשָׁכְרָ֔ה <S%H7937><s%> le-sha-che-Rah, but ye are not filled with drink לָב֖וֹשׁ <S%H3847><s%> la-Voosh ye clothe וְאֵין־ <S%H369><s%> ve-'ein- one לְחֹ֣ם <S%H2527><s%> le-Chom you but there is none warm ל֑וֹ lo; וְהַ֨מִּשְׂתַּכֵּ֔ר <S%H7936><s%> ve-Ham-mis-tak-Ker, and he that earneth wages מִשְׂתַּכֵּ֖ר <S%H7936><s%> mis-tak-Ker earneth wages אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into צְר֥וֹר <S%H6872><s%> tze-Ror [to put it] into a bag נָקֽוּב׃ <S%H5344><s%> na-Kuv. with holes פ Peh

כֹּ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot; of hosts שִׂ֥ימוּ <S%H7760><s%> Si-mu appoint לְבַבְכֶ֖ם <S%H3824><s%> le-vav-Chem heart עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and דַּרְכֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1870><s%> dar-chei-Chem. your ways

עֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Lu Go up הָהָ֛ר <S%H2022><s%> ha-Har to the mountain וַהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם <S%H935><s%> va-ha-ve-Tem and bring עֵ֖ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz wood וּבְנ֣וּ <S%H1129><s%> u-ve-Nu and build הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit; the house וְאֶרְצֶה־ <S%H7521><s%> ve-'er-tzeh- and I will take pleasure בּ֥וֹ bo ; וְאֶכָּבֵד ve-'ek-ka-ved כוְאֶכָּבְדָ֖ה <S%H3513><s%> ve-'ek-ka-ve-Dah abounding with קאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

פָּנֹ֤ה <S%H6437><s%> pa-Noh Ye looked אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַרְבֵּה֙ <S%H7235><s%> har-Beh for much וְהִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold לִמְעָ֔ט <S%H4592><s%> lim-'At, and lo [it came] to little וַהֲבֵאתֶ֥ם <S%H935><s%> va-ha-ve-Tem and when ye brought הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit [it] home וְנָפַ֣חְתִּי <S%H5301><s%> ve-na-Fach-ti I did blow ב֑וֹ vo; יַ֣עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an Because מֶ֗ה <S%H4100><s%> Meh, Why נְאֻם֙ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'Um upon it Why;saith יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot, of hosts יַ֗עַן <S%H3282><s%> Ya-'an, Because בֵּיתִי֙ <S%H1004><s%> bei-Ti of mine house אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he חָרֵ֔ב <S%H2720><s%> cha-Rev, that [is] waste וְאַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem of you רָצִ֖ים <S%H7323><s%> ra-Tzim and ye run אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man לְבֵיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1004><s%> le-vei-To. unto his own house

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- because כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that עֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Chem, because כָּלְא֥וּ <S%H3607><s%> kal-'U over you is stayed שָׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim Therefore the heaven מִטָּ֑ל <S%H2919><s%> mit-Tal; from dew וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz and the earth כָּלְאָ֥ה <S%H3607><s%> kal-'Ah is stayed יְבוּלָֽהּ׃ <S%H2981><s%> ye-vu-Lah. [from] her fruit

וָאֶקְרָ֨א <S%H7121><s%> va-'ek-Ra And I called חֹ֜רֶב <S%H2721><s%> Cho-rev for a drought עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz upon the land וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- on הֶהָרִ֗ים <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim, and upon the mountains וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- on הַדָּגָן֙ <S%H1715><s%> had-da-Gan and upon the corn וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- on הַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <S%H8492><s%> hat-ti-Roosh and upon the new wine וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- on הַיִּצְהָ֔ר <S%H3323><s%> hai-yitz-Har, and upon the oil וְעַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al on אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher what תּוֹצִ֖יא <S%H3318><s%> to-Tzi bringeth forth הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah; and upon [that] which the ground וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- on הָֽאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam and upon men וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- on הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <S%H929><s%> hab-be-he-Mah, and upon cattle וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> ve-'Al and on כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יְגִ֥יעַ <S%H3018><s%> ye-Gi-a' and upon all the labour כַּפָּֽיִם׃ <S%H3709><s%> kap-Pa-yim. of the hands ס sa-Mek

וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' obeyed זְרֻבָּבֶ֣ל׀ <S%H2216><s%> ze-rub-ba-Vel Then Zerubbabel בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שַׁלְתִּיאֵ֡ל <S%H7597><s%> shal-ti-'El of Shealtiel וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> vi-ho-Shu-a' and Joshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְהוֹצָדָק֩ <S%H3087><s%> ye-ho-tza-Dak of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֜וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol the high וְכֹ֣ל׀ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol all שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> she-'e-Rit with all the remnant הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, of the people בְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> be-kOl the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem, their God וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei and the words חַגַּ֣י <S%H2292><s%> chag-Gai of Haggai הַנָּבִ֔יא <S%H5030><s%> han-na-Vi, the prophet כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after שְׁלָח֖וֹ <S%H7971><s%> she-la-Cho had sent יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem; their God וַיִּֽירְא֥וּ <S%H3372><s%> vai-yi-re-'U did fear הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am him and the people מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> Vai-yo-mer Then spake חַגַּ֞י <S%H2292><s%> chag-Gai Haggai מַלְאַ֧ךְ <S%H4397><s%> mal-'Ach messenger יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD'S בְּמַלְאֲכ֥וּת <S%H4400><s%> be-mal-'a-Chut message יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh in the LORD'S לָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> la-'Am unto the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor; saying אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> 'a-Ni I אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem for נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> ne-'um- I [am] with you saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַיָּ֣עַר <S%H5782><s%> vai-Ya-'ar stirred up יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רוּחַ֩ <S%H7307><s%> ru-aCh the spirit זְרֻבָּבֶ֨ל <S%H2216><s%> ze-rub-ba-Vel of Zerubbabel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שַׁלְתִּיאֵ֜ל <S%H7597><s%> shal-ti-'El of Shealtiel פַּחַ֣ת <S%H6346><s%> pa-Chat governor יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et ר֙וּחַ֙ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach and the spirit יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <S%H3091><s%> ye-ho-Shu-a' of Joshua בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְהוֹצָדָק֙ <S%H3087><s%> ye-ho-tza-Dak of Josedech הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol, the high וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et ר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach, and the spirit כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol of all שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> she-'e-Rit of all the remnant הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; of the people וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and they came וַיַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su and did מְלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> me-la-Chah, work בְּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> be-veit- in the house יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-hei-Hem. their God פ Peh

בְּי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> be-Yom day עֶשְׂרִ֧ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim and twentieth וְאַרְבָּעָ֛ה <S%H702><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Ah In the four לַחֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month בַּשִּׁשִּׁ֑י <S%H8345><s%> bash-shish-Shi; of the sixth בִּשְׁנַ֥ת <S%H8141><s%> bish-Nat year שְׁתַּ֖יִם <S%H8147><s%> she-Ta-yim in the second לְדָרְיָ֥וֶשׁ <S%H1867><s%> le-da-re-Ya-vesh of Darius הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech. the king
